interpretation: Low vocal confidence - frequent pauses, hesitations, and disfluency indicate uncertainty in speech
recommendations: Consider reducing frequent pausing - 96.0% of speech time is pauses. Aim for 20-40% pause time.
Try to reduce some long pauses - 8 pause(s) longer than 1 second detected. A few long pauses are fine, but many can reduce flow.
Try speaking at a slightly faster pace - current rate is 59.3 WPM. A rate of 100-220 WPM sounds more natural.
Try to improve speech fluency - 12 pauses detected makes speech somewhat choppy. Practice speaking more smoothly.
